prontera,164,172,4	script	Elmo	732,{
OnVendingClick:
switch(select("Topo:Meio:Baixo")) {
		case 1: // Pet Food
                switch(select(" Topo 1: Topo 2")	){
                case 1: callshop "topo",1;break;
                case 2:callshop "topodois",1;  break;
                default:break;}
			end; // We end the script just after opening the shop so no need to break
		case 2: callshop "Meio",1;end;
		case 3: callshop "Baixo",1;end;
		default: close; // This statement closes and ends the script so no need to end again
	}
end;
OnInit:
showvend( "Elmo", 1, "Elmos" );end;
}
prontera,164,169,4	script	Armaduras	666,{
OnVendingClick:
	callshop "Armadura",1;end;
OnInit:
showvend( "Armaduras", 1, "Armaduras" );end;
}
prontera,164,166,4	script	Armas	635,{
OnVendingClick:
switch(select("Adagas:Arcos:Cajados:Chicotes:Espadas:Fuuma:Katar:Lanca:Livros:Macas:Machados:Manoplas:Instrumentos:Armas")) {
		case 1: callshop( "Adagas", 1 );end; 
		case 2: callshop "Arcos",1;end;
		case 3: 
				switch(select("Cajados de uma mao:Cajados de duas maos")) {
				case 1: callshop( "One-handed Staffs", 1 );end; 
				case 2: callshop "Two-handed Staffs",1;end;
				default: close; }
			end;
		case 4: 
			callshop "Chicotes",1;
			end;	
		case 5: 
		switch(select("Espadas de uma mao:Espadas de duas maos")) {
				case 1: callshop( "One-handed Swords", 1 );end; 
				case 2: callshop "Two-handed Swords",1;end;
				default: close; }
			end;
		case 6: callshop "Fuuma Shurikens",1;end;		
		case 7: callshop "Katars",1;end;		
		case 8: 
			switch(select("Lancas de uma mao:Lancas de duas maos")) {
				case 1: callshop( "One-handed Spears", 1 );end; 
				case 2: callshop "Two-handed Spears",1;end;
				default: close; }end;
		case 9: callshop "Books",1;end;
		case 10: callshop "Maces",1;end;	
		case 11: 
				switch(select("Machados de uma mao:Machodos de duas maos")) {
				case 1: callshop( "One-handed Axes", 1 );end; 
				case 2: callshop "Two-handed Axes",1;end;
				default: close; }
                end;	
		case 12: callshop "Manoplas",1;end;
		case 13:callshop "Instrumentos",1;end;	
		case 14:callshop "Armas_guns",1;end;															
		default: close; }
end;
OnInit:
showvend( "Armas", 1, "Armas" );end;
}

OnVendingClick:
    callshop "Shields",1;end;
OnInit:
    showvend( "Escudos", 1, "Escudos" );end;
}

}
prontera,164,157,4	script	Sapatos	512,{

	callshop "Footgears",1;
end;

OnInit:
showvend( "Sapatos", 1, "Sapatos" );
end;
}
// Npc Acc
prontera,164,154,4	script	Acessorios	655,{
OnVendingClick:
switch(select("Acessorios 1:Acessorios 2:Acessorios 3:Acessorios 4:Acessorios 5")) {
		case 1: // Pet Food
			callshop( "Accessories 1", 1 );
			end; // We end the script just after opening the shop so no need to break
		case 2: // Pet Armor
			callshop "Accessories 2",1;
			end;
		case 3: // Taming Items

			callshop "Accessories 3",1;
			end;
		case 4: // Taming Items

			callshop "Accessories 4",1;
			end;	
		case 5:
		callshop "Acessories 5",1;
		end;	
		default: // Any other case not covered above. "Not today" in this example.
			close; // This statement closes and ends the script so no need to end again
	}
end;
OnInit:
showvend( "Acessorios", 1, "Acessorios" );
end;
}
// Npc Cartas
prontera,164,151,4	script	Cartas	896,{
OnVendingClick:
switch(select("Acessorios:Sapatos:Capa:Escudo:Armas:Amradura:Elmo:MvP Selada")) {
	case 1: // Pet Food
			callshop( "Accessory Cards", 1 );
			end; // We end the script just after opening the shop so no need to break
		
	case 2: // Pet Food
			callshop( "Footgear Cards", 1 );
			end; // We end the script just after opening the shop so no need to break
	case 3: // Pet Food
			callshop( "Garment Cards", 1 );
			end; // We end the script just after opening the shop so no need to break

	case 4: // Pet Food
			callshop( "Shield Cards", 1 );
			end; // We end the script just after opening the shop so no need to break

	case 5: // Pet Food
			callshop( "Weapon Cards", 1 );
			end; // We end the script just after opening the shop so no need to break

	case 6: // Pet Food
			callshop( "Armor Cards", 1 );
			end; // We end the script just after opening the shop so no need to break

	case 7: // Pet Food
			callshop( "Headgear Cards", 1 );
			end; // We end the script just after opening the shop so no need to break
	case 8: // Pet Food
			callshop( "Sealed MVP Cards", 1 );
			end; // We end the script just after opening the shop so no need to break						
		default: // Any other case not covered above. "Not today" in this example.
			close; // This statement closes and ends the script so no need to end again
	}
end;
OnInit:
showvend( "Cartas", 1, "Cartas" );end;
}
